jobDescription: Research Intern -- DiDi Labs (Los Angeles) Our team in Los Angeles is currently focused on Natural Language Processing. We are excited about the future of communication, transportation, and artificial intelligence. Smart cars should speak and understand human language, and people should be able to order services and solve their problems by speaking. Furthermore, people who speak different languages should be able to communicate with one another.  Research Interns make key contributions to our overall mission by helping to pioneer new research directions. Interns work with Dr. Kevin Knight and other PhD scientists at DiDi Labs on novel, challenging problems. Previous interns working with Dr. Knight have published articles in the field's top venues.  Sample publications include: "Recurrent Neural Networks as Weighted Language Recognizers" (Y. Chen, S. Gilroy, A. Maletti, J. May, and K. Knight), Proceedings of NAACL 2018.
